Articles.Content:
Simple as that:

Make an SSTO that can also return safely (not necessarily in 1 piece)

Points:

10 - complete the mission safely

5 - get into Keosynchronous orbit

2 - orbit minmus

5 - land on minmus (doesnt stack with orbit the mun)

5 - orbit the mun

10 - land on the mun (doesnt stack with orbit the mun)

10 - land at KSC

10 - land on minmus then orbit the mun

20 - land on minmus then on the mun

30 - after doing the mission, do it again

Note: I am aware of the K-Prize. This is a separate challenge since it also gives you the possibility of not only going to orbit but to the mun

Highscores

1. mager42 - Skylon3M - 20 points

My Skylon3M SSTO spaceplaneplane Muun lander. /it is maybe beter call it SSTM - Single Stage To Muun/

At launchpad.

Orbiting kerbin.

Landed on Muun.

Safe back on KSC. /My first direct return to KSC from Muun, without parking orbit first./

Stock + Mechjeb.
Nice! 20 points for that since you went and landed on the mun and returned safely
